agency_name: COMMUNITY ACTION PROGRAM, INC. OF WESTERN INDIANA
agency_desc: A community action agency that works collaboratively with community partners to promote economic self-sufficiency by removing the causes and conditions of poverty through services, support, and education.
site_name: COMMUNITY ACTION PROGRAM, INC OF WESTERN INDIANA - VERMILLION COUNTY
service_description: Provides weatherization services for income eligible homeowners and renters at no cost to them. Services may include but are not limited to; general air sealing, insulation upgrades, heating equipment replacement, and baseload energy consumption reduction.
site_details: Call or visit the website to apply.
site_eligibility: Living in Vermillion or Parke County -- Household income at or below 200% Federal Poverty Guidelines

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
taxonomy_name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: An organization with charitable outreach services, including a food pantry.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to those in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Living in Vermillion County -- Limit one (1) visit every 30 days

agency_desc: A faith-based nonprofit organization providing shelter and support services for area persons in need.
site_name: LIGHT HOUSE MISSION THRIFT STORE - CLINTON
service_description: Offers donated clothing, shoes, and small household items for sale at discount prices. All proceeds support the agency's soup kitchen, homeless shelters, and other human service programs.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides routine health and safety inspections and investigates complaints against restaurants, grocery stores, and other food service establishments in the County. Provides consultation and licensing for retail food service vendors and food safety education for individuals, health fairs, and community groups.
site_details: Call to make a complaint about licensed food service establishments in the County or for details about licensing or food safety programs.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; serves Vermillion County

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement services and maintains the correctional facility for Vermillion County.
service_description: Maintains the Vermillion County correctional institution used to detain persons who are in lawful custody, including accused persons awaiting trial and those who have been convicted of a crime and are serving a sentence of less than one year.
site_details: Call or visit the website for scheduling details.
site_eligibility: Must be on the inmate's approved visitor list -- Age 18 or older (or accompanied by someone over 18 who is also on the inmate's visitor list)

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_details: Walk in for emergency care; call for additional information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Provides advocacy, information, referrals, and support services to crime victims and witnesses in Vermillion County. Assists in the filing of restraining or protective orders, offers court accompaniment services, and provides information about case status, victim compensation, victim rights, and the legal process.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility: Victims and witnesses of major crimes in Vermillion County -- Filed charges

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: Coordinates emergency management programs and response measures in Vermillion County.
service_description: Responds during a disaster or large-scale emergency in Vermillion County, assists with the recovery efforts afterwards, and takes steps to prevent or lessen the effects of future disasters.
site_details: Call for information. For emergency assistance, call 9-1-1.
site_schedule: Vary; on call for emergencies daily 24 hours
Vary; on call for emergencies daily 24 hours
Vary; on call for emergencies daily 24 hours
Vary; on call for emergencies daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Open; serves Vermillion County

agency_desc: The county clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities, administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration, issues marriage licenses and records state tax liens.
service_description: Serves as a voter registration site and provides information about voting, candidates, absentee voting, and volunteering to work the polls. Oversees county-level elections, candidate filings, and campaign finance.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Call for information -- Walk in or visit website to register
site_schedule: Clerk's Office: Mon-Fri 8am-noon and 1pm-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Registering to vote: United States citizen -- Age 18 by the day of the next election -- Not currently incarcerated -- To vote: Registered to vote a minimum of 29 days before the election

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access. Printing and scanning available, as well as faxing and notary services. Children's story time and teen programs available everyday.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Clinton Township of Vermillion County

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Vermillion County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority fortheir respectivecounty, including performing the following duties:controls, maintains, and supervises county property; audits and authorizes claims against the county; receives bids for and authorizes county contracts; performs certain election functions; handlesappealof township trustee decisions.
site_details: Call for assistance.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm; Board Meetings: Alternating Tues 8:15am
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm; Board Meetings: Alternating Tues 8:15am
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Offers a gymnasium hosting a variety of activities for youth and adults, including basketball, pickleball, and indoor walking or running.
site_details: Walk in; must check in and pay at the circulation desk.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Vermillion County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Vermillion County, which is then used to assess taxes. Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on boundaries and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information. www.vermilliongov.us
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Vermillion County

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Clinton in Vermillion County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Clinton in Vermillion County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours or call Vermillion County dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Clinton in Vermillion County

agency_name: VERMILLION COUNTY SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT DEPARTMENT
agency_desc: Provides information about local recycling opportunities and coordinates an annual tire recycling event.
site_name: VERMILLION COUNTY SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT DEPARTMENT
service_description: Offers information about recycling options in the area and hosts an annual tire recycling event each spring.
site_details: Call for more information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides maintenance services on public roads and streets.
service_description: Maintains county roadways in Vermillion County, including patching, paving, snow removal, street sweeping, roadside mowing, and drainage along roadways.
site_details: Call for information or to report a problem. To report urgent problems after hours, call 9-1-1 or Vermillion County dispatch.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to county roads and properties in Vermillion County)

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Vermillion County.
site_details: Varies; cases are generally initiated through the prosecutor's office, private attorneys -- individuals representing themselves. For juror information, contact the Circuit Court.
site_eligibility: Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court

agency_desc: Provides shelter for unwanted and stray animals in Parke and Vermillion counties. Offers lost-and-found services, and rehomes pets through adoption.
service_description: Provides donated pet food, when available, to Parke and Vermillion County pet owners who cannot afford to feed their pets. Supplies are limited, and assistance is available on an emergency basis only.
site_details: Call for availability.
site_eligibility: Living in Parke or Vermillion County -- Financial hardship

agency_desc: Provides emergency fire and medical services.
service_description: Responds to fire, emergency medical, hazardous material, and special rescue situations in the city of Clinton in Vermillion County. Non-emergency services include fire prevention education and public awareness. Persons in need of emergency services should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides water and sanitary sewer utility services for the city of Clinton in Vermillion County.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Call for billing information. Bills may be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone; a drop box is located at this address.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides street maintenance, storm-sewer maintenance, snow and ice control, dead animal pick-up, street-sign maintenance, and grounds-keeping of city parks and public properties in the city of Clinton in Vermillion County.
site_details: Call for information, to submit a request, or make a report.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including community meals.
service_description: Provide a hot community meal to all; male or female.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides comprehensive and integrated health care services including primary care, behavioral health, dental, and patient support.
site_name: VALLEY PROFESSIONALS COMMUNITY HEALTH CENTER - CAYUGA
service_description: Provides dental services to people with a financial need. Services include fillings, extractions, and cleanings.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment. -- Visit www.valleyprohealth.org/locations for location hours.
site_eligibility: Open -- For sliding scale fees: Income at or below 200% Federal Poverty Guidelines

agency_desc: A church offering worship services and charitable outreach programs, including a food pantry.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food and a hot meal to those in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Living in northern Vermillion County -- Limit one visit per month

agency_desc: A faith-based, nonprofit organization that provides worship services and charitable outreach including clothing, limited financial assistance, and a monthly meal.
service_description: Provides nonperishable and perishable food to those in need.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Walk in, call, or email for information.
site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran

agency_desc: A 24-hour crisis intervention agency that provides inpatient and outpatient behavioral health care; mental health and addictions treatment for all ages.
service_name: OUTPATIENT SUBSTANCE ABUSE TREATMENT - VERMILLION COUNTY
service_description: Provides assessment and outpatient counseling and treatment for people with substance abuse issues and their families.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call the office for information or to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open (minimum age served determined by individual assessment) -- Living in Parke, Vermillion, or Vigo county

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including a meal site.
service_description: Provides a weekly hot meal. Open to all in need.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open
